short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you open a new tab, this Google Chrome extension will give you one Adobe shortcut to learn every day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚡️ Become a better creative
⚡️ Work much faster
⚡️ Learn Adobe shortcuts

As creatives we know learning Adobe’s shortcuts will save us time. The only issue, there’s so many!

When you open a new tab, this Google Chrome extension will give you one Adobe shortcut to learn every day. This makes learning more manageable so you’ll be an expert in no time.
